unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing News: Virality Trends
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing News: Virality Trends

unnormalised: Hey folks, wanna know what’s trending faster than a chaiwala sighting during rush hour in Mumbai? Virality is a tricky beast, but we're seeing some interesting patterns!
normalised: Hey folks, wanna know what is trending faster than a chaiwala sighting during rush hour in Mumbai? Virality is a tricky beast, but we are seeing some interesting patterns!

unnormalised: This week, short-form video challenges are still reigning supreme, especially those tied to Bollywood films. Remember the “Kesariya” dance trend? Expect more of that! IIT-Delhi researchers are even studying the algorithms behind these viral surges, trying to predict the next big thing. Fascinating, right?
normalised: This week, short-form video challenges are still reigning supreme, especially those tied to Bollywood films. Remember the “Kesariya” dance trend? Expect more of that! I I T-Delhi researchers are even studying the algorithms behind these viral surges, trying to predict the next big thing. Fascinating, right?

unnormalised: Also, authentic, "desi" content is killing it. Think Grandma's secret recipes or relatable everyday struggles. Forget airbrushed perfection; people crave realness.
normalised: Also, authentic, "desi" content is killing it. Think Grandma's secret recipes or relatable everyday struggles. Forget airbrushed perfection; people crave realness.

unnormalised: Micro-influencers with niche audiences are gaining serious traction too. Brands are realizing the power of authentic connection over sheer follower count. One Delhi-based influencer saw a 300% increase in engagement just by focusing on sustainable living.
normalised: Micro-influencers with niche audiences are gaining serious traction too. Brands are realizing the power of authentic connection over sheer follower count. One Delhi-based influencer saw a three hundred percent increase in engagement just by focusing on sustainable living.

unnormalised: So, keep it real, keep it relevant, and maybe throw in a little Bollywood magic! That seems to be the recipe for social media gold, at least for now. Stay tuned for more updates!
normalised: So, keep it real, keep it relevant, and maybe throw in a little Bollywood magic! That seems to be the recipe for social media gold, at least for now. Stay tuned for more updates!
